about_the_game:
Located on the border between Florida and Georgia is the beautiful Lake Seminole . Fed by the Chattahoochee and Flint Rivers, this reservoir is named after the Native American tribes indigenous to the Florida region.
Whether you’re looking to fish the small creeks around the islands that pepper this long stretch of water, or if you want to fish around points of interests like the in-game Lake Seminole Dam, this venue has something for everyone!
This authentic venue gives anglers the most thrilling bass fishing experience. The underwater action is just as busy with underwater foliage, structure, points of interest and more that can be found when fishing these amazing waters.

Key Features Include:
- 12 Fish Species to land including Legendary Largemouth Bass , Spotted Bass and new fish to Bassmaster® Fishing 2022 such as Flathead Catfish and Striped Bass .
- Unique in-game environments to explore such as the Lake Seminole Dam .
- Dense and active underwater action with hotspots and structure to find and fish.
- The all-new Dynamic time of day system so you can fish from sunrise to sunset.
- Unique named Legendary fish to hunt and land.
- Special Mastery Challenges specific to Lake Seminole.

Located on the border between Florida and Georgia is the beautiful Lake Seminole . Fed by the Chattahoochee and Flint Rivers, this reservoir is named after the Native American tribes indigenous to the Florida region.
Whether you’re looking to fish the small creeks around the islands that pepper this long stretch of water, or if you want to fish around points of interests like the in-game Lake Seminole Dam, this venue has something for everyone!
This authentic venue gives anglers the most thrilling bass fishing experience. The underwater action is just as busy with underwater foliage, structure, points of interest and more that can be found when fishing these amazing waters.

Key Features Include:
- 12 Fish Species to land including Legendary Largemouth Bass , Spotted Bass and new fish to Bassmaster® Fishing 2022 such as Flathead Catfish and Striped Bass .
- Unique in-game environments to explore such as the Lake Seminole Dam .
- Dense and active underwater action with hotspots and structure to find and fish.

name: Bassmaster® Fishing 2022: Lake Seminole

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2Gb dedicated video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Located on the border between Florida and Georgia is the beautiful Lake Seminole . Fed by the Chattahoochee and Flint Rivers, this reservoir is named after the Native American tribes indigenous to the Florida region.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
